Nicholes Wong, Diploma in Business Management at Nanyang PolytechnicLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 16 Oct 2018Kind of similar but different. Investment portfolio is a collection of all your investments for diversification purpose so that you minimize the risk. So if financial crisis were to happen, you will be able to reduce the negative impacts on your investments.0 comments1

Hariz Arthur Maloy, Independent Financial Advisor at Promiseland IndependentTop Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered on 16 Oct 2018Exactly. A portfolio is a combination of all assets you own that generate return.To go deeper, a portfolio also needs to be well balanced. Allowing you to weather financial storms and downturns and provide you with stability and confidence in return when you require it. 0 comments1
